sys_properties.choices: global=Virtual Attachments are enabled on all forms table=Virtual Attachments are only activated on the tables configured by the property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.tables script=Virtual Attachments are only activated on records that the property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.script returns true on formatter=Virtual Attachments are only activated on forms that have included the 'Virtual Attachments' on the form (via Configure > Form Layout)
sys_properties.description: Defines how virtual attachments are enabled on the forms. The property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.enabled acts as a dead man's switch, meaning that if this property is turned off all virtual attachment related script are deactivated instantly.
sys_properties.name: x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.mode
